Rulings.Base: 1. "Biofalcon" must be face-up on the field when a Machine-Type monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY in order to activate its effect. It does not have to be face-up on the field when the effect resolves.\n2. You cannot activate the effect of "Biofalcon" when it is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY.

PSCT.Base: When a Machine-Type monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard while this card is face-up on the field, you can add 1 Machine-Type monster with 1000 or less ATK from your Deck to your hand.
